feature_model.constraints: c2: ~CYGBLD_BUILD_REDBOOT_WITH_XYZMODEM or CYGINT_REDBOOT_LOAD_METHOD c3: ~CYGBLD_REDBOOT_LOAD_INTO_FLASH or CYGSEM_REDBOOT_VALIDATE_USER_RAM_LOADS c4: ~CYGHWR_REDBOOT_ARM_FLASH_SIB or CYGINT_REDBOOT_ARM_FLASH_SIB_SUPPORTED cXXX: ~CYGPKG_NONE
